#labels Control
=The *Repeat* Block=

To access the *Repeat* Block, click *Control*.

|| *Option* || *Description* ||
|| *repeat while* || Keeps doing something as long as the condition exists.||
|| *repeat until* || Keeps doing something until the condition no longer exists.||
|| *do* || What should be done during each iteration (round) of the loop. ||


*Tip*: To make useful sentences, combine the *If Then* block with these other blocks:

 * [http://code.google.com/p/google-blockly/wiki/Wall Wall] 
 * [http://code.google.com/p/google-blockly/wiki/True_False True_False] 
 * [http://code.google.com/p/google-blockly/wiki/Move Move]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/google-blockly/wiki/Turn Turn]

You can write statements like:

 * Repeat until *wall ahead?*
 * Do *move backward*
